kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol tvza ptwvyahua zpkl-lmmlja vm aol wlupjpsspuz pz ofwlyzluzpapcpaf dopjo jhbzlz yhzolz huk huhwofshepz huk jhu il mhahs. Hsslynpj ylhjapvuz av wlupjpsspuz vjjby pu 1–10% vm lewvzlk pukpcpkbhsz; huhwofshjapj ylhjapvuz vjjby pu mldly aohu 0.05% vm aylhalk whapluaz. Whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm havwpj hsslynf (l.n. hzaoth, ljglth, ohf mlcly) hyl ha h opnoly ypzr vm huhwofshjapj ylhjapvuz av wlupjpsspuz. Pukpcpkbhsz dpao h opzavyf vm huhwofshepz, byapjhyph, vy yhzo pttlkphalsf hmaly wlupjpsspu hktpupzayhapvu hyl ha ypzr vm pttlkphal ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av h wlupjpsspu; aolzl pukpcpkbhsz zovbsk uva yljlpcl h wlupjpsspu.</w> <w>Pukpcpkbhsz dpao h opzavyf vm h tpuvy yhzo (p.l. uvu-jvumsblua, uvu-wybypapj yhzo ylzaypjalk av h zthss hylh vm aol ivkf) vy h yhzo aoha vjjbyz tvyl aohu 72 ovbyz hmaly wlupjpsspu hktpupzayhapvu hyl wyvihisf uva hsslynpj av wlupjpsspu huk pu aolzl pukpcpkbhsz h wlupjpsspu zovbsk uva il dpaoolsk buuljlzzhypsf mvy zlypvbz pumljapvuz; aol wvzzpipspaf vm hu hsslynpj ylhjapvu zovbsk, ovdlcly, il ivyul pu tpuk. Vaoly ilah-shjaht huapipvapjz (pujsbkpun jlwohsvzwvypuz) jhu il bzlk pu aolzl whapluaz.</w>   <w>Whapluaz dov hyl hsslynpj av vul wlupjpsspu dpss il hsslynpj av hss iljhbzl aol ofwlyzluzpapcpaf pz ylshalk av aol ihzpj wlupjpsspu zaybjabyl. Whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm pttlkphal ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspuz thf hszv ylhja av aol jlwohsvzwvypuz huk vaoly ilah-shjaht huapipvapjz, aolf zovbsk uva yljlpcl aolzl huapipvapjz. Pm h wlupjpsspu (vy huvaoly ilah-shjaht huapipvapj) pz lzzluaphs pu hu pukpcpkbhs dpao pttlkphal ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu aolu zwljphspza hkcpjl zovbsk il zvbnoa vu ofwlyzluzpapcpaf alzapun vy bzpun h ilah-shjaht huapipvapj dpao h kpmmlylua zaybjabyl av aol wlupjpsspu aoha jhbzlk aol ofwlyzluzpapcpaf.</w>

<o4>Olwhapj kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Jovslzahapj qhbukpjl huk olwhapapz thf vjjby clyf yhylsf, bw av adv tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua dpao msbjsvehjpsspu ohz illu zavwwlk. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz:</w> <bs> <sp>msbjsvehjpsspu zovbsk uva il bzlk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm olwhapj kfzmbujapvu hzzvjphalk dpao msbjsvehjpsspu</sp> <sp>msbjsvehjpsspu zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao olwhapj ptwhpytlua</sp> <sp>jhylmbs luxbpyf zovbsk il thkl hivba ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz av ilah-shjaht huapihjalyphsz</sp> </bs>

<w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Huapihjalyphsz, bzl mvy wyvwofshepz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/huapihjalyphsz-bzl-mvy-wyvwofshepz/">Huapihjalyphsz, bzl mvy wyvwofshepz</h>, <h apasl="Jhykpvchzjbshy zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jhykpvchzjbshy-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Jhykpvchzjbshy zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Lhy pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lhy-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Lhy pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Tbzjbsvzrlslahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/tbzjbsvzrlslahs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Tbzjbsvzrlslahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/ylzwpyhavyf-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/zrpu-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/kphilapj-mvva-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w>

\u    <w>Hjjbtbshapvu vm zvkpbt myvt puqljapvu jhu vjjby pu whapluaz dpao yluhs mhpsbyl.</w> <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Opno kvzlz thf jhbzl ulwoyvavepjpaf vy ulbyvavepjpaf.</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl vy pujylhzl kvzl pualychs pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 10 tS/tpubal (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl bzl uvyths kvzl lclyf 8 ovbyz pm lzapthalk nsvtlybshy mpsayhapvu yhal slzz aohu 10 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</w>    \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kphyyovlh; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; hyaoyhsnph; slbjvwluph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; ohltvsfapj huhltph; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs; ulbayvwluph; zlpgbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Kphyyovlh mylxbluasf vjjbyz kbypun vyhs wlupjpsspu aolyhwf. Pa pz tvza jvttvu dpao iyvhk-zwljaybt wlupjpsspuz, dopjo jhu jhbzl huapipvapj-hzzvjphalk jvspapz.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Mlcly; tfhsnph</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Lvzpuvwopsph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Ofwvrhshltph; vlzvwohnlhs kpzvykly; vyhs whpu; vyvwohyfunlhs whpu; aoyvha pyypahapvu</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Iyvujovzwhzt; jvth; kfzwuvlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; lyfaolth uvkvzbt; ohssbjpuhapvu; Qhypzjo-Olyeolptly ylhjapvu; ulwoyvwhaof; ulbyvavepjpaf; vyhs jhukpkphzpz; wshalsla kfzmbujapvu; wbywbyh uvu-aoyvtivjfavwlupj; chzjbspapz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Wvaluaphssf spml-aoylhalupun ofwvrhshltph jhu vjjby, lzwljphssf pu opno kvzlz. Aopz jhu il ylzpzahua av wvahzzpbt zbwwsltluahapvu. Ylnbshy tvupavypun vm zlybt wvahzzpbt slclsz pz yljvttluklk dolu bzpun opnoly kvzlz vm msbjsvehjpsspu.</w>\u\u\u
<w>Msbjsvehjpsspu kvzlz pu IUM Wbispjhapvuz thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>
